P1: Irrational Investors is an invite-only snapchat group where people who have an interest in investing and trading get together and share their trading ideas, analysis and investment tricks. You don't need to be an expert to join - you just have to be interested in trading.
L1: Tap below to join our waiting list
P2: We don't limit our conversational topics to just crypto and stocks, we're open to every financial topic - You can join and share your ideas about e-commerce, drop-shipping, property/retail, product flipping, and anything else that involves money! We have and accept all ranges of people, from newbies to seasoned professionals already working in the industry.
